sentences.sContent: I’m absolutely starving – I missed lunch.
sentences.sCn: 我饿坏了——我没吃上午饭。

sentences.sContent: He missed 20 games after breaking a bone in his wrist.
sentences.sCn: 由于手腕骨折，他错过了20场比赛。

sentences.sContent: She was upset at missing all the excitement.
sentences.sCn: 精彩部分都错过了，她很失望。

phrases.pCn: n. [计]相近差错；（炸弹）近距脱靶；（车辆）侥幸免撞
不论成功与否；无计划的；漫不经心的
没打中目标；没达到目的
n. 阳光小美女（电影名称）

trans.tranOther: to not go somewhere or do something, especially when you want to but cannot
